issue.title: [Format] Define looser version of record batch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to support a version of RecordBatch where:
- columns can be omitted from the flatbuffer metadata (we can already skip the payload by sending a Buffer of length 0)
- each Column may have independent lengths
